text: You finally enter the throne room ready to confront the wicked overlords of this land! You raise your stats to smite them with your zombie hordes before you are interrupted.
I have come to cleanse this land with my Army of Undead.
you need to get ready for bed honey remember your bedtime has moved up.
this Injustice shall not stand I have brought my Army to Smite you!!!
If you go to bed now will give you a cookie before naptime tomorrow
Through vile bribery, my plans have been once again foiled, but vengeance will be mine!
That's nice Princess now it's time for the royal bath.
Come, Reginald, we must wage war against Mr.ducky in the bath!
I blame your father in law.
